## packages

prepare packages
```{r}
install.packages("ggthemes")
install.packages("GDAdata")
install.packages("flexclust")
```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
```

```{r}
data(SpeedSki, package = "GDAdata")
ggplot(SpeedSki, aes(x=Speed, fill=Sex)) + xlim(160, 220) +
geom_histogram(binwidth=2.5) + xlab("Speed (km/hr)") +
facet_wrap(~Sex, ncol=1) + ylab("") +
theme(legend.position="none")
```

```{r}
data(btw2009, package = "flexclust")
btw2009 <- within(btw2009, Linke2 <- 100*LINKE2/valid2)
ggplot(btw2009, aes(Linke2)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 1,
fill = "mediumpurple") + ylab("") +
xlab("Percentage voter support for Die Linke in 2009")
```
